text: Tłumaczów is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Radków, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland, near the border with the Czech Republic. It lies approximately north of Radków, north- west of Kłodzko, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. ==Notable residents== *Paul Bartsch (1871-1960), German-American malacologist ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Tłumaczów
